trans-unit.source: An abstract WCF extension class for specifying a custom discovery service or for getting the published endpoints.
trans-unit.target: En abstrakt WCF tillägget klass för att ange en anpassad discovery-tjänsten eller för att hämta publicerade slutpunkter.

trans-unit.source: Derive a class from DiscoveryServiceExtension and override the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryServiceExtension.GetDiscoveryService%2A> method to return your custom discovery service.
trans-unit.target: En klass härledd från DiscoveryServiceExtension och åsidosättning av <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryServiceExtension.GetDiscoveryService%2A>metod för att returnera anpassade discovery-tjänsten.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryServiceExtension.GetDiscoveryService%2A>

trans-unit.source: Add your derived class to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost> extensions that host your discoverable service.
trans-unit.target: Lägg till den härledda klassen till den <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost>tillägg som värd för tjänsten kan upptäckas.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.System%23ServiceModel%23Description%23IServiceBehavior%23Validate%2A> is called the behavior iterates through the extensions in the service host and looks for a DiscoveryServiceExtension.
trans-unit.target: När den <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.System%23ServiceModel%23Description%23IServiceBehavior%23Validate%2A>kallas beteendet går igenom tillägg i tjänstvärden och söker efter en DiscoveryServiceExtension.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.System%23ServiceModel%23Description%23IServiceBehavior%23Validate%2A>

trans-unit.source: If one is found its <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryServiceExtension.GetDiscoveryService%2A> is called to get the custom discovery service.
trans-unit.target: Om en sådan finns dess <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryServiceExtension.GetDiscoveryService%2A>anropas för att hämta anpassade discovery-tjänsten.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryServiceExtension.GetDiscoveryService%2A>

trans-unit.source: If an extension is not found the default discovery service implementation is used.
trans-unit.target: Om ett tillägg inte hittades standardimplementering discovery-tjänsten används.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryServiceExtension"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryServiceExtension"> </xref> klass.

trans-unit.source: Override this method to return your custom <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryService"></xref> implementation.
trans-unit.target: Åsidosätta den här metoden om du vill återställa dina anpassade <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryService"> </xref> implementering.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown while opening the service host if this method returns `null`
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>genereras när du öppnar tjänstvärden om den här metoden returnerar `null` </xref:System.InvalidOperationException>

trans-unit.source: Gets a read-only collection of published endpoints.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar en skrivskyddad samling publicerade slutpunkter.

trans-unit.source: The property should be accessed only after the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost> has successfully opened.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen ska användas endast när den <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost>har öppnats.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost> is in <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> state, the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.EndpointDiscoveryMetadata> is being generated and added to the collection.
trans-unit.target: När den <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost>i <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState>tillstånd, den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.EndpointDiscoveryMetadata>är som genereras och läggs till i samlingen.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.EndpointDiscoveryMetadata> </xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> </xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost>

trans-unit.source: A read-only collection of published endpoints.
